Hexxagon.View

Class PlayBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Support.mvc.TView
      • Hexxagon.View.PlayBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPlayBoard, IView

    public class PlayBoard
extends TView
implements IPlayBoard
    Instance of this class realises a virtual game board as a JavaFX specific graphical node.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      Instances of this class implements a graphical component on board.
      private static class  PlayBoard.Coordinate
      Instances of this class represents coordinates storing x and y values.
